results.title: Metformin protects fibroblasts from patients with GNE myopathy by restoring autophagic flux via an AMPK/mTOR-independent pathway.
results.text_hl: The pathogenesis of @<m>DISEASE_Distal_myopathy_Nonaka_type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536816 @@@GNE myopathy@@@ is described, and the significance of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in this disease is observed.

citations.NLM: Zhang T, Yin X, Yu X, Shang R, Lu L, Miao J. Metformin protects fibroblasts from patients with GNE myopathy by restoring autophagic flux via an AMPK/mTOR-independent pathway. Biomed Pharmacother. 2023 Aug;164():114958. PMID: 37263165
